content.text: Do not change the column headers in Row 1 as this is used to complete the upload.
The table below lists the columns and which columns are required or optional.

Table 1:
Column Name | Column Required | Max Length | Notes
Asset ID | Yes | 24 | The Asset ID of the vehicle or machine you are tracking logs on. Post Date
Contact
Site
Miles
Hours
Oil
Oil Cost
Oil Budget Group
Oil Budget
Oil Part
Oil Warehouse
Fuel
Fuel Cost.
